description: Represents the core essence of self, vitality, ego, self-expression, creativity, and the life force.
Symbolizes emotions, instincts, nurturing, intuition, the subconscious mind, and our emotional responses.
Signifies communication, intellect, logic, learning, adaptability, and the exchange of information.
Represents love, beauty, harmony, relationships, attraction, pleasure, and the appreciation of art and aesthetics.
Symbolizes energy, action, passion, drive, assertiveness, courage, and the pursuit of goals and desires.
Signifies expansion, growth, abundance, wisdom, optimism, generosity, and the search for meaning and higher knowledge.
Represents structure, discipline, responsibility, limitations, boundaries, endurance, and the lessons of life.
Symbolizes innovation, rebellion, individuality, freedom, sudden changes, intuition, and breaking away from tradition.
Signifies imagination, spirituality, intuition, dreams, illusions, creativity, and the dissolution of boundaries.
Represents transformation, power, regeneration, intensity, hidden forces, rebirth, and the process of profound change.
